charinfo.name: Young Kakashi
charinfo.description: A jounin at the age of 13 and the son of the legendary White Fang, Kakashi is a member of Team Minato. Using his early ninjutsu, and borrowed sharingan, Kakashi can fight any adult on an equal level.

abilities.name: White Fang Slash
abilities.description: Using his sword, Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

abilities.name: Amateur Raikiri
abilities.description: Using a weaker form of his signature jutsu, Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

abilities.name: Implanted Sharingan
abilities.description: For 2 turns, if one enemy uses a skill that removes/steals chakra, Kakashi will gain 1 random chakra; if they use a skill that stuns, Kakashi's skills will stun for 1 turn; if they use a skill that damages, Kakashi will deal additional 10 damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. Ends when triggered.

abilities.name: Sword Parry
abilities.description: This skill makes Young Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.
